/* Electronic gaming */ almsot certainly never to get a separate article fro main keno one
/* Types of gambling */ Changed the casino games section to Table, Electronic, and Other.
Deleted uncited American-centric addition. Might be worth adding to the problem gambling article, but not appropriate here.
added the estimates of problem gamblers in the United States and the rise of teenagers who are gambling
/* Types of gambling */ Changed the link under "beatable games" to a main article link to advantage gambling
/* See also */ rmv dupe, style says one link to a page per page

Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/168.170.198.150|168.170.198.150]] ([[User talk:168.170.198.150|talk]]) to last version by Objective3000
it's not ignored, but your entry is like saying keno can be beat when you get a two for one ticket with your room; we are talking about games here, not beating promotions
Semantics. Many people have made a living at bonus hustling. It is certainly gambling. How can it be ignored?
Roulette AP has rarely anything to do with biased wheels as enough bias to beat wthout a computer is no longer common.
/* "Beatable" casino games */ online casinos are not "games"; individual casino games are listed; bonuses don't make games beatable, they make promotions beatable
